mapper.select: SELECT dependencies.id as id, from_resource_id as fromResourceId, sLeft.version as fromVersion, to_resource_id as toResourceId, sRight.version as toVersion, dep_usage as "usage", dep_weight as weight FROM dependencies JOIN snapshots as sLeft ON dependencies.from_snapshot_id = sLeft.id JOIN snapshots as sRight ON dependencies.to_snapshot_id = sRight.id
